name: Simple Complex Puzzle
description:
Very Simple you have to sort the numbers in the right order.
1 2 3 4 5 6 in easy mode

or 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 in hard mode.

Complex try it and you will know.

Use the Buttons on the Screen to rotate the numbers.
try to sort the numbers in the right order

Demo Game Play
